name: Project Dagger
description:
What is Project Dagger?


Project Dagger is an Open World Hack and Slash Adventure game. Meet and befriend unique and funny characters. Battle fierce enemies with a variety of different combat styles from Melee to Ranged and even spell based! Explore anything from lush vibrant environments to dark gritty landscapes. Anything is possible in Project Dagger!

Features

  • Jobs System - Play minigames in cities to earn extra money for your adventures.
  • Melee and Ranged combat systems.
  • Buy and sell to NPC vendors anywhere in the world.
  • Collect and store items in the continent specific museums to receive bonus rewards.
  • Befriend characters and get special quests and rewards depending on relationship level.
  • Explore dark and decrepit dungeons.
  • Equip and combine armor in hundreds of different combinations.
  • Dozens of different weapons to choose from.
  • Enjoy real time in game events and holidays.
  • Explore a multitude of different zones and areas.
  • Battle dozens of different enemy types.




Branding Artwork was commissioned by @Pelko_P on Twitter.
